summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Campbell Place Southwest, from West Lander Street to 56th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading, paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 109740 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
